example.name: typical transitive
example.text: And they believe the Big Board, under Mr. Phelan, has abandoned their interest.

example.name: ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Consumers Power Co. , now the main unit of CMS Energy , ran into financial problems over its $ 4.2 billion Midland nuclear plant , which was abandoned as a nuclear facility in 1984 because of construction delays and high costs .
example.arg: because of construction delays and high costs

example.name: with preferred item
example.text: One Colombian drug boss, upon hearing in 1987 that Gen. Noriega was negotiating with the U.S. [*] to abandon his command for a comfortable exile, sent him a hand-sized mahogany coffin engraved with his name.

example.name: give up to
example.text: Once he had abandoned himself to the very worst, once he had quieted all the dragons of worry and suspense, there would n't be very much for Mae to do.
